title: bajarE raguveeram
sahitya:
bhajarE raghuvIram mAnasa bhajarE raghuvIram
anupallavi

ambudaDimbha viDambana gAtram ambuda vAhana nandanadAtram
caraNam 1

krshika sutArpita kArmuka vEdam vashi hrdayAmbuja bhAskara pAdam
   
caraNam 2

kuNDala maNDan maNDita karNam kuNDali mancakam-adbhuta varNam
   
caraNam 3

daNDita sunda sutAdika vIram maNDitam-anukulamAshraya shIlam
   
caraNam 4

paramahamsam-akhilAgama vEdyam parama vEda makuTI pratipAdyam
